Room.Name: Nylandian Beach
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the southern most tip of Lelion Beach and Park.
Room.LongDescription: looking southwest, you see the entire Nylandian Bay and the guarded exit to the Respitial Sea. In the middle of the bay is an island that houses the Marina Guard and the Oceancrest Marines. If you look north, you see the famed Lyanden Lighthouse at the western point of the Lelion Beach and Park peninsula. Large rocks are at the water's edge here, providing the marine mammel life a place to sun themselves.
